name: clime-registry
description: CLI-first universal registry for AI agent-compatible CLIs

scripts.build: npm run build -w @cli-me/shared-types && npm run build -w @cli-me/cli && npm run build -w @cli-me/openclaw-skill && npm run build -w @cli-me/mcp-server && npm run build -w @cli-me/api && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-indexer && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-verifier && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-analytics
scripts.build:api: npm run build -w @cli-me/shared-types && npm run build -w @cli-me/api
scripts.build:web: echo "apps/web is private and not included in this public repository"
scripts.build:workers: npm run build -w @cli-me/shared-types && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-indexer && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-verifier && npm run build -w @cli-me/worker-analytics
scripts.dev:web: echo "apps/web is private and not included in this public repository"
scripts.start:web: echo "apps/web is private and not included in this public repository"
scripts.test: npm run build -w @cli-me/shared-types && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w @cli-me/shared-types && npm run typecheck --workspaces --if-present
